section.title: Disable SUID Core Dumps
section.para: Explicitly prevents any SUID program from writing a core dump file on abnormal termination. SUID

Core dumps can consume considerable amounts of disk space, and may contain sensitive data. It is recommended to disable core dumps if they are not needed, especially for programs that may contain privileged user information such as from SUID programs. Core dumps
